languages.text: "Ласеракс, скоморох. Ты натравил его на губернатора — не отпирайся".

traits.locale_text: "Глейто тоже. Вместо этого он будет долго и скрупулезно рвать тебя на клочки. Отвечай на вопрос".

languages.text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."
languages.original_text: "Ласеракс, скоморох. Ты натравил его на губернатора — не отпирайся".

traits.locale_text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."
"The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."
"The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."
"The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."
"The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."

languages.text: “是异虎干的，小丑。是你放出了异虎，吃掉了总督，别找借口。”
languages.original_text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."

traits.locale_text: “是异虎干的，小丑。是你放出了异虎，吃掉了总督，别找借口。”

languages.text: «El lacerax, bufón. Usted lo liberó para que atacase al gobernador; no intente negarlo».
languages.original_text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."

traits.locale_text: «El lacerax, bufón. Usted lo liberó para que atacase al gobernador; no intente negarlo».

languages.text: "Laseraksı diyorum, soytarı. Onu valinin üzerine saldın. İnkâr etmeye çalışma."
languages.original_text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."

traits.locale_text: "Laseraksı diyorum, soytarı. Onu valinin üzerine saldın. İnkâr etmeye çalışma."

languages.text: 「ラセラックスだろう、道化。総督の前でラセラックスを解放したんだろう―しらばくれるなよ」
languages.original_text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."

traits.locale_text: 「ラセラックスだろう、道化。総督の前でラセラックスを解放したんだろう―しらばくれるなよ」

languages.text: « Le lacérax, imbécile. Vous l'avez lancé sur le gouverneur. Inutile de le nier. »
languages.original_text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."

traits.locale_text: « Le lacérax, imbécile. Vous l'avez lancé sur le gouverneur. Inutile de le nier. »

languages.text: "Der Lacerax, Narr. Ihr habt ihn auf den Gouverneur gehetzt. Versucht gar nicht erst, es zu leugnen."
languages.original_text: "The lacerax, fool. You unleashed it on the governor — don't try to deny it."

traits.locale_text: "Der Lacerax, Narr. Ihr habt ihn auf den Gouverneur gehetzt. Versucht gar nicht erst, es zu leugnen."
